name: Vegan Smores Cookie Bars
description: Vegan Smores Cookie Bars feature a golden cookie crust, plenty of chocolate chips and a marshmallow topping that gets toasty in the oven! A crowd pleasing warm weather dessert.
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons almond milk (soy or coconut milk fine)
1 1/4 cups vegan chocolate chips (I used mini chocolate chips)
10 ounces vegan marshmallows (I used Trader Joes brand)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line an 8 x 8 inch pan with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line an 8 x 8 inch pan with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the melted vegan butter, brown sugar, vanilla and almond milk until smooth. Now add the flour, baking powder and salt and mix with a large wooden spoon until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, whisk together the melted vegan butter, brown sugar, vanilla and almond milk until smooth. Now add the flour, baking powder and salt and mix with a large wooden spoon until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2/3 of the cookie dough into the pan and push it down evenly with your hands. (If it sticks, wet your hands slightly as needed.)
recipeInstructions.name: Add 2/3 of the cookie dough into the pan and push it down evenly with your hands. (If it sticks, wet your hands slightly as needed.)

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle 1 cup of the chocolate chips on top of the cookie dough (leave 1/4 cup for the top). Now add the marshmallows, evenly, on top of the chocolate chips.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle 1 cup of the chocolate chips on top of the cookie dough (leave 1/4 cup for the top). Now add the marshmallows, evenly, on top of the chocolate chips.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the rest of the cookie dough on top, as well as the rest of the chocolate chips.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the rest of the cookie dough on top, as well as the rest of the chocolate chips.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 25 minutes until golden brown. May also broil for just a couple of minutes to make the marshmallows even more toasty, but watch closely so it doesn't burn! Let cool for 10 minutes or so before slicing and serving. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 25 minutes until golden brown. May also broil for just a couple of minutes to make the marshmallows even more toasty, but watch closely so it doesn't burn! Let cool for 10 minutes or so before slicing and serving. Enjoy!

keywords: smores bars, vegan cookie bars, vegan smores
